remarks: Closure of the row replacement function for square matrices:  The matrix for a minor is a matrix.  (Contributed by AV, 13-Feb-2019.)
statement:
minmar1cl.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
minmar1cl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
minmar1cl $p |- ( ( ( R e. Ring /\ M e. B ) /\ ( K e. N /\ L e. N ) ) -> ( K ( ( N minMatR1 R ) ` M ) L ) e. B ) $.
